website_summaries.verdict: Neater and easier to use than a traditional pot, thanks to its "squeeze bottle" design.
pros: Allows users to hold their head upright, rather than tipping sideways
Irrigation process is neater and more comfortable, with less water lost to spills
Comes with five premixed salt packs
cons: The thin plastic bottle can't easily be sterilized and should be replaced every 90 days

customer_reviews.title: Answer to a prayer
customer_reviews.text: This simple tool for cleansing my sinuses his an answer to a prayer. I've lived my life suffering from sinus infections. My wife read about these and after getting used to them I've gone two years without a sinus infection, longest I've gone since my teen years. For those who suffer from sinusitis; JUST GET A KIT AND USE IT!!! Your life will never be the same as you get to live free from the misery you've grown used to. For me I've battled this for 30+ years and now have spent years with no problems after years of multiple infections a year.
customer_reviews.author: IowaScott2019

customer_reviews.title: It has changed my quality of life.
customer_reviews.text: Prior to a recommendation from a friend, I had tried so many things for my sinus congestion. I tried a Neti pot, Himalayan salt inhaler, personal warm air inhaler, both warm and cool room vaporizers, 3 different kind of prescription steroid nasal sprays and over the counter decongestants. Since I have been using the NeilMed product, I have to say that my breathing has improved. I'm not saying it's a cure-all. I'm still thinking I need to figure out if I'm allergic to something, etc. but it has definitely helped and I will continue to use it because it has improved my quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than neti pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kid who has allergies. He had previously been using a neti pot (also made by Neilmed). However, he likes this product much better because it (1) is so much faster to use and (2) has greater force which allows usage under more congested situations. When using the neti pot, there were times when he was so congested that the water simply wouldn't flow. Hint: When doing the 60 second microwave sterilization, make sure you use a microwave-safe plate otherwise these bottles WILL melt (and you will be glad you bought the 2-pack for a spare).
customer_reviews.author: Koolbuys

customer_reviews.title: Vomit inducing plastic smell, doesn’t go away with washing
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these Neilmed sinus rinse squeeze bottles in the past from pharmacies in my area and never had a problem, but this one from Amazon has a terrible chemical plastic smell when being used. Like, truly disgusting, vomit inducing. I have never smelled anything like this before in any of my prior Neilmed sinus rinse bottles, which leads me to believe it is a problem with this particular supplier, unless Neilmed recently changed their manufacturing process. It didn’t get better with vigorous washing in hot water and soap, and I truly cannot tolerate the smell. It’s going in the trash since I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Hendo

customer_reviews.title: Really Effective for Wild, Crazy Sinus Problems
customer_reviews.text: I liked that I could buy new nasal rinse containers without buying hundreds of salt packets. I use mine a fair amount and I like to switch to new ones every six months so I have clean, sterile containers. I have stubborn and fairly frequent allergic reactions to pollens, dust, etc. I get stuffed up and lose energy and can't breathe well. This sinus rinse procedure works better and faster than any of the medications I take. Often it takes care of the sinus reaction overnight; sometimes it takes two days. I swear by it. If you fly a lot and have trouble with sinus because of pressure changes, try these rinses. They work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: E-Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Not functional/product comes in pieces that are broken
customer_reviews.text: I tried to contact seller and return for exchange; only to find there are no returns. The bottle doesn't work- it's loose..its literally useless. Please do not purchase from this seller if you have chronic sinus disease; as the sinus rinse bottle doesn't work as a bottle. I may as well use a saucer. The tube connecting the bottle to flush is loose and I am now just boiling my old bottles purchased at Walgreens instead of using this useless "kit" More like..useless money down the drain :(
customer_reviews.author: JulietStl

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Just be surprised when water comes out other nostril into sink. For the price and what it does is great. Certainly don't need to buy the expensive one which collect to "outbound" discharge. Be SURE to use bottled water or you will defeat the purpose. I loosen the cap of he water bottle and put it in the microwave to warm it up. The packets need to be used, but I use them once every 4 times or once a month. Am not a DR so this is not medical advice, its what I do.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Allen

customer_reviews.title: The best sinus rinse ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best & cheapest nasal rinse that actually works! If you have any sinus issues this works great , is not expensive & I dont buy distilled water to use (As recommended0 My Doctor said to just use water that had been boiled. So I make a cup of tea & use the cool boiled water. Been using one for over a year. This was , well just time for new one. The original one works just the same. The say replace the bottle every 3 months but I could only think this is a sales ploy because its ) just fine after a year.
customer_reviews.author: T. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Much better than traditional neti pot
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a neti pot user for a while. After transitioning to this squeeze bottle it has been a much more enjoyable and successful experience. The light pressure from being able to squeeze it actually gets more stuff out. An important note though is that this thing should be cleaned with soap and water after every use, sterilized in the microwaves did only use distilled or boiled water for sinus rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: TXJaxon

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: My spouse and I have been using these for years. They are amazing for unclogging your sinuses and nasal cavity of mucous due to allergies or sickness. It is always a huge relief to be able to fully breathe after using. We usually have to dispose of the bottles before using all the packets that come with the big kit, so it is great to have the option to just purchase the bottles, saving money. We always follow the directions for sterilizing the bottles, and always use distilled water as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected but the letters on the bottle peeled ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected but the letters on the bottle peeled off onto the straw part that I was drying next to the bottle and that was a bit hard to remove. I had to scrape it off with my nail. I somehow misread the instructions so the first time I thought I could warm up the water in the bottle because cold water is kind of "shocking" for my nasal sinuses. But no, I guess microwaving is for disinfecting? I still don't really know. In short, while the instructions are clear and in English, they could be improved on. For now, I just suffer cold water when it's cold and endure the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Poiuytrew.q

customer_reviews.title: Great relief for nasal congestion!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this product. When I suffer from allergies, colds, or any type of congestion it is a godsend of relief. I have actually had a bad cold about a week now with stuffiness where blowing my nose all day long does not relieve it. Then I use the Neilmed bottle, solution, and warm water and it breaks it all up so it clears out when I blow my nose. I use it about twice a day when I am congested and it works better than any oral congestion medicine I have ever tried. It's a little weird to get used to if you have never tried it, but so well worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: V.  Rolader

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Plastic is flexible.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for what it is. Ordering was easy and delivery was prompt. I realized later that I could have purchased it locally with a generous supply of rinse packs for less money. It still is a good product and I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies
customer_reviews.text: I've used this system for a while now, to prevent sinus issues with seasonal allergies. It did take some getting used to, but with practice it's not bad at all. Just make sure to check the water temp on your inner wrist before using to reduce scalding risk, and sterilize. NEVER EVER use tap water, either. Fun facts.
customer_reviews.author: Acrabana

customer_reviews.title: strong plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rinser because my doctor recommend it. According to my doctor this type of rinser is better for nose because it gives pressure when rinsing.Basically it means it will clean better than the other one like teapot shape rinser. I dislike it because the bottle is cheap plastic. I can smell the plastic when rinsing my nose--very strong plastic smell. Dislike it. However, I am grateful it is not that expensive to try out.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: ... this to my son an allergy sufferer as myself easy to use vs the old fashioned type of a ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son an allergy sufferer as myself easy to use vs the old fashioned type of a netty pot. use distilled or boiled water. It helps with sinuses and to heal inside remember is a saline a salt so do not use it daily but even my dr says it helps for infections / I always use a little bit of coconut oil after around the edges of nostrils and inside so the nose dont get dried out. So myself and son and now close friend use this brand and netty pot
customer_reviews.author: v. zamay

customer_reviews.title: Had surgery before anything would clear... but WOW this works!
customer_reviews.text: Surgery in 1988... did not help me. Surgery 2010 was somewhat helpful. Surgery again in 2012 opened them up so irrigation really clears out sinuses. My infections have been drastically reduced. The more times per day I irrigate, the healthier I stay. And you will too... this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Tch1

customer_reviews.title: It's Not Sexy, But It Works!
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from any nasal issues - allergies in particular - this is the way to go. Described by a co-worker as self-waterboarding, this method keeps the junk in your sinuses flushed out so that the chances of infection are greatly reduced. If it keeps you from getting into more medication, by all means, try it!
customer_reviews.author: k9rescuer702

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t expect this to work so well. It’s extremely easy to use, with very through directions. I really like how you can sanitize it in the microwave. Just don’t leave it in more than 40 seconds. I accidentally left it in for 60 seconds and it melted the shape of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shane B

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: works like a charm and is great for sinus sufferers. I've been using for a few months now and it really helps to keep my sinus clear and clean reducing my tendency for sinus attacks and sinus infections. Along with my zertec and flonase, the trifecta is great!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Double pack of bottles, but no indundation of rinse packets
customer_reviews.text: I regularly use the Neilmed sinus rinse kit, which works wonderfully for clearing your sinuses, but usually you have to get a new bottle with 50 rinse packs which means you can collect more rinse packs than you can possibly use! This wonderful set is great when you don't need the packets, but just the rinse bottle since they only have 5 packets with each bottle. Finally I could get to the bottom of my stash of sinus rinse packets!
customer_reviews.author: Homespun

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of allergies and sinus issues. I have tried the pots but when i used them my ears would bother me. i like the bottle much better because i don't have to tilt my head and it doesn't make my ears hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lane

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with the fact that I've had 3 sinus surgeries and have allergies. This bottle is a lifesaver. I've used this brand bottle and salt packets for over 10 years with great outcome. Just make sure you store the bottle in a place that allows it to dry out (I turn it upside down) and replace it as the package instructs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pyles

customer_reviews.title: Do not like the electric version. This is more handy and for travel too.
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel and at home. The electric versions and I had two of them, the first unit stopped working in a month of two. The switch is dead or something. The second one went dead with months again. I gave up as this has to be a design or quality issue and bought this plastic bottle. Yes, the electric one should work better to remove the sinus stuff but .....
customer_reviews.author: Lion Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cleans out sinus
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years. I got it for my cousin who was having sinus issues. Works great, really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: cthemom

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I use these. He had no problems using a Neti pot. I just couldn't get the hang of those but this thing is easy to use. I find using a half packet less irritating than a full one. I also found that non-iodized salt (a pinch, no more) works well, too. Too much salt burns so be careful if you substitute the non-iodized salt for the prepared packets that come with the kit and can be bought separately. While I still have sinus problems due to many allergies, I have fewer problems now than before I started using this product.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Helps prevent sinus infections
customer_reviews.text: I was prone to sinus infections until I started using this product. I also started using it regularly during cold and flu season. While it's hard to prove a negative, the only time I have caught a cold or flu in 3 years was when I was traveling without it.
customer_reviews.author: Rigel

customer_reviews.title: saved my allergy life
customer_reviews.text: I used to sneeze all day everyday. Since I started using this nasal rinse I have improved by 95%. Just the occasional times I am out and about without access to nasal cleaners I have allergy issues. Once I get home and clean it out I'm pretty much good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny K.

customer_reviews.title: Still a good product after all these years.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this stuff for years - works well but packets of "wash" are spendy. Mixture of table salt/baking soda (75/25 apx) works as well at a fraction of the cost. Bottle is best-working of all the similar products I've tried
customer_reviews.author: rfn

customer_reviews.title: Great nasal wash kit!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a neti-pot for years. This is so much better. No weird angles for your head, and the pressurized water seems to clean out all the "gunk" better than the traditional pot. This is also able to be thrown in the microwave for sanitation. Definitely worth it. The salt they use is great, but it only comes with 5 packets.. so be sure to stock up!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: So much easier to use than a traditional neti pot ...
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use than a traditional neti pot and just as effective! I have allergies year round, though typically use this sinus rinse during the changing of seasons and throughout the winter here in the PNW. The solution is gentle enough to use daily.
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: works wonders
customer_reviews.text: this works wonders year round. helps with congestion and colds and allergies.
customer_reviews.author: CandiCrush

customer_reviews.title: Best deal out there.
customer_reviews.text: My family goes through these bottles regularly. They do work better when replaced as recommend. When the labeling on the bottle fades and the bottle becomes soft, replace it. So, far this is the best deal for thes that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Best option imo
customer_reviews.text: This is the best neti pot system I've tried. And I tried a few. This one has the best flow. Instead of relying on gravity and the width of the spout, this allows you to simply squeeze harder or lighter to get the right flow you want.
customer_reviews.author: summonthemuse

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: As someone with chronic sinus trouble all my life, using these bottles at least once a day has replaced my almost weekly visits to my ENT. I almost never get sinus infections anymore thanks to these things. I cannot say enough about the positive effects of proactive healthcare. These are cheap and effective. Also, remember if you are a chronic user of these like myself, buy in bulk. These should be replaced every three months to avoid bacterial buildup. Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: If you want to stop taking antibiotics for sinus infections, this is your solution... I went from taking 4-6 rounds of antibiotics a year for sinus infections and for over 8 years I haven’t taken any.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since the Neti Pot
customer_reviews.text: I find this to be much easier and less messy than using the traditional Neti Pot. You don't have to put your head in the sink and crink your neck to use this. It produces a nice adjustable flow, which you control by adjusting how strongly you squeeze the bottle. The bottle holds enough fluid for a thorough rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Waltzing Matilda

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I found that this product has changed my life. I had SEVERE allergies and my allergist suggest that I use it. I was a bit apprehensive about squirting water up my nose, but got over it quick. It has improved my allergies by 98%. I have a new found life without allergies. I love it and swear by it. I tell everyone with allergies to buy this cause it will change your life. Only thing is that you have to use it religiously or it won't work. I also noticed that I don't get sick as often now.
customer_reviews.author: Fancie

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for over 20 years and have recommended it to many friends & relatives
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement bottle for me. I have used this product for over 20 years and have recommended it to many friends & relatives. I have 365 day; 24/7 environmental allergies and could not imagine life without this product. I also use their sinus rinse saline packets and NasaDoc Plus stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for allergy season
customer_reviews.text: Essential during allergy season or anytime you’ve got nasal issues. Just make sure you use distilled or properly boiled water.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Not snotty!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in the past two of the Neilmed battery operated nasal cleaners. Each quit within a short period of time of purchase. I decided to try this instead and it works great with as much good result and less than half the cost. Also there are no parts to breakdown. Recommend this product if you have sinus or nasal clogging. Very safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dotti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for nasal allergy symptoms. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing helps nasal allergy symptoms like this. If you're thinking "I could NEVER squirt water up my nose!" fear not. It's weird as hell at first, but you get used to it quickly. You will be amazed at how much this helps without the drowsiness of antihistamines or jitteriness of decongestants.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sinus sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of this product. I've had sinus issues on and off for many years (no allergies though), and the sinus rinse definitely helps. I would warn first-time users that if you have never tried a sinus rinse before, it may feel "weird" the first time. However, many of my family and friends that I have recommended this product to stated that they got used to it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Viola

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this and raves about how much it cleans her nasal canal out. I have tried it and it works well. Definitely a good idea when you are sick to reduce the amount of time you are sick.
customer_reviews.author: Derek P

customer_reviews.title: headaches and sinus irritation
customer_reviews.text: Do to the work environment and pollens I have had sinus problems. I use this daily to clean my sinuses. I find it helps relieve headaches and sinus irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Use distilled water!
customer_reviews.text: If you have any kind of respiratory problems you absolutely need to do this every single day or more often.
customer_reviews.author: DebiDeaux

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my Ear
customer_reviews.text: Sinus rinse works as advertised. Recommended by my Ear, Nose and Throat Physician as a preventive means to stop future sinus infections. I have used the rinse twice daily for two months with no infection reoccurrence. I highly recommend this product! !
customer_reviews.author: BobRonCo

customer_reviews.title: Great Sinus Cleansing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this up to twice a day due to having severe allergies. Helps to rinse away allergens and congestion. This sinus rinse helped reduce the number of sinus infections I would get a year. Be sure to use with distilled or purified water, not tap water.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Extra bottle offer is nice
customer_reviews.text: It actually works! It's a good deal if you take advantage of the free bottle they offer. They sent it to me quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent nasal rinse product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using one for a few years, but had to replace it recently. This works pretty good for me to help cleanse pollens and stuff from my sinuses during allergy season.
customer_reviews.author: David Wiese

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: My colds have decreased by about 90%! I work in a petri dish (a school setting). The combination of this stuff and Flonase has been quite a break. Forgot what it was like not coming down with a cold once every 1-1.5 months.
customer_reviews.author: sceneit

customer_reviews.title: My doctor recommended this.
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this. Due to other medical issues I can't take the normal cold medicines. This gadget provides the sinus relief I have wanted for years. And there are no side effects as with drugs. It took a few days to get use to it, but after getting a routine down it's easy and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Walt J 336

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Air leaks, so no pressure to push up water through opening. Therefore doesn't work as advertised. Likely just a bad batch, but doesn't allow returns/replacements apparently.
customer_reviews.author: IKS

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for cleaning your nasal passages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Get sinus infections alll the time. First time trying and within the end of the day felt better! Usually my colds linger for weeks for since using they're gone within a couple days! Best thing I've ever used way easier than a neti pot
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Easy Product
customer_reviews.text: I think the bottle is so easy to use and it definitely helps clear me out. The trick is to pant like a dog while squeezing. Great for allergy season.
customer_reviews.author: SLP Ward

customer_reviews.title: haha
customer_reviews.text: This is for some reason very refreshing yet disgusting at the same time because you know, you get to see what comes out of your nostrils. Works well, may take time to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Joon Hee Chang

customer_reviews.title: Clean your sinuses
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this for people with constant nasal issue’s. Good to use for allergies or when your sick.
customer_reviews.author: osofast2

customer_reviews.title: Great for congestion
customer_reviews.text: Love the sinus rinse for colds and congestion. The pre-measured packets make use really easy and it does a great job relieving congestion. Squeeze bottle definitely reduced mess compared to the traditional pot for a klutz like me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Better than neti pots
customer_reviews.text: The squeeze bottle was suggested by my allergy doctor. It is much easy using than neti pots, especially when you have congested sinuses. It is easy for you to control the pressure by squeezing the bottle. I have already used it about 4 or 5 month for the same bottle and it is still good.You must keep it clear and dry after using. You can find a a good article("Is Rinsing Your Sinuses With Neti Pots Safe?") to teach you how to do sinus rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well.
customer_reviews.text: Without getting into details, it does what it is supposed to do. Especially after a dusty day of cutting grass.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: If you can't sleep because of congestion this product really works
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff for people who have high blood pressure like myself or for people who have congested can headaches from the congestion. It really goes in your sinus cavities and gets all the snot out of there so you can breathe easier.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hero

customer_reviews.title: Really helps me breathe at night!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor said my sinuses were really dry and to stop spraying Sinex He recommended the water treatment and it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Focus on the product, not the marketing materials in the box
customer_reviews.text: They spent more money on the marketing materials/product catalog in the box than the product itself. Apparently, they know I’m not going to buy this product again, and understand they better try to sell me something else instead. Unlikely...
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Sinus Rinse bottle ( should be replaced every 90 days)
customer_reviews.text: I am getting great results when I remember to do my sinus rinse at least once a day (twice a day works even better), but I feel that following instructions about changing bottles every 90 days or so might be a good suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this to help avoid recurrent sinus infections and so far it is making a good difference.
customer_reviews.author: WMD0926

customer_reviews.title: Great for irrigation
customer_reviews.text: Use lukewarm water. Perfect irrigation. Don't have to tilt your head. Just face down in the sink and gently squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Day

customer_reviews.title: Great product to put an end to dry sinuses and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product to put an end to dry sinuses and sinus headaches. Easy to use with warm salt water. Be sure to use salt water and there is no sting to sinus linings. I have used these for years and have gotten many others to use them too... all with good reports.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: So far I really love this product ..... replaces my neti pot....... easy to use and curbs the allergies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Knorr

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies sufferers.
customer_reviews.text: Since I've been using it I've seen a big decline in my allergies and sinus issues. Very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday - it has helped tremendously. No more drips in the back of my throat.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: if you have sinus problems this is a huge help
customer_reviews.text: ONLY USE DISTILLED WATER This product has saved me hundreds on doctor bills... i used to get sinus infections about once a month, but when i feel my nose getting stopped up I use this and my problem is usually solved. For about 10 dollars this is just a MUST try for practically everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nick 1983

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of salty makes this purchase rather sweet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect since you're supposed to replace the bottles every 3 months but I can't ever find the bottles without a million packets of saline solution. This solves the problem by only giving you 5 packets with the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this squeeze bottle neti pot. It’s awesome for my allergies and for colds.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Borlaug

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works fantastic for someone with small /narrow nasal passages. It's a stream of water rushing up your nose, so it takes getting use to - but you're going to get a great result.
customer_reviews.author: Kym77

customer_reviews.title: It has GREATLY helped my sinus infection problem but even better is the fact that my chronic cough is almost ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was suggested by my doctor. It took a few uses to get used to the "procedure" but now it seems to be just part of a routine. It has GREATLY helped my sinus infection problem but even better is the fact that my chronic cough is almost gone.
customer_reviews.author: DK in St. Louis

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies
customer_reviews.text: Got this very quickly. I find it easier to use than a Neti pot. Allergy doctor convinced me to try it and I wasn't sorry. I use it regularly. This was a good price and a convenient way to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki LF

customer_reviews.title: Daily routine.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day, it’s the only thing that saves me in south Texas. Highly recommend by my sinus specialist.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use and easy to clean as well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased once before a long time ago. My allergies started acting up, so I purchased this one. To me this is a very gentle way to clean out the nasal passages. very easy to use and easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: wend

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but has a plastic smell even after washing in hot water with soap several times.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this from the netti pot and it is so much better. Use it when having sinus issues
customer_reviews.author: Jenjen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily and it has decreased the number of sinus infections and allergy reactions greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I have used it several times to stem off a sinus infection. For me it helps keep the sinus area hydrated. I still get the headaches, just not as bad. Unfortunately as I have seen with a few previous review I have gotten the drainage that causes the tube that runs to the throat to be very inflamed and painful.
customer_reviews.author: RDL

customer_reviews.title: Great Sinus Rinse
customer_reviews.text: This works great! My sinus issues have diminished by 99% using this rinse!
customer_reviews.author: Roger P. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Use it daily.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day during the pollen, sinus etc. season. I works. I have a neti pot but this is so much easier to use and seems to help just as much. I also purchased extra salt packets and they are great. So much easier and better than using just salt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sinus Wash
customer_reviews.text: Great Sinus Wash. I love that you can control the water pressure buy squeezing it.
customer_reviews.author: ANAS

customer_reviews.title: SOOTHING RINSE
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use, takes less than 60 seconds, makes my sinuses happy!
customer_reviews.author: plm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Try doing it once a day and notice yourself taking less allergy meds.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use these a lot and they work great. This is the best way to buy extra bottles.
customer_reviews.author: 2SlowJoe

customer_reviews.title: A Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should own one of these. I'm not sure how people get through sinus infections without them now! We even bought a second for my husband to keep at work. And the off brand salt packets we tried burned, these don't!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great way to clean out sinus cavities, I always rinse when I have been exposed to sickness and it seems to help me from catching colds and stuff
customer_reviews.author: alb1957

customer_reviews.title: This product has made it quick and easy to keep my sinuses clear
customer_reviews.text: This product has made it quick and easy to keep my sinuses clear. My doctors recommend nasal rinsing for everyday use, as well as to help deal with dryness associated with CPAP machines. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ackert

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love sinus flushing and all its benefits and this bottle does a great job at flushing out the old beak on my face...refreshing and yes even fun to do..try it yourself I highly recommend..
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it for my friend in Sweden as nothing works for her allergy, It got their super fast and she is very pleased with it that's the only thing that helps her out of all the prescribed and over the counter medications she has been using.
customer_reviews.author: Shan Sam

customer_reviews.title: Sinuses
customer_reviews.text: I use this bottle everyday for I have had 2 sinus surgeries. I rinsed with a product called Alkohol
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and really cleans sinuses
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and really cleans sinuses. HOWEVER, if you have small sinus cavities, it can cause pain in your ears. So while it cleaned my sinuses great, I had to stop using it because the rinse backed up into my eustachian tubes and caused me earaches. I am the exception, not the rule. So if you normally don't have eustachian tube problems, this product will work well for you. I ended up using the packets as a saline spray solution - which works great.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bottle and great solution
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bottle and great solution. Wish I would have ordered more of the packets, but wasn't sure how I would like it. It really makes my sinuses feel much better.
customer_reviews.author: Bes

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend making the switch to this bottle for anyone that's used a neti pot and been frustrated by blockage. The bottle itself is sort of soft plastic so it's easy to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE SINUS RINSE
customer_reviews.text: I can't get excited about a sinus rinse kit. It included what was listed on the box, and it is easy to use. After a few uses, it lessens my sinus congestion, which is all I ask from it.
customer_reviews.author: Snoop Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement packs
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can buy these without 200+ packets. Will definitely buy my replacement ones on here from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Neilmed Sinus Rinse Starter Kit (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Size:8 OunceUse for: nasal dryness; sinus pressure and nasal congestion; nasal symptoms from flu and cold; post nasal drip; nasal irritation from occupational and house dust, fumes, animal dander, grass, pollen, smoke and environmental pollutants. Now soothing saline nasal rinse is as easy as 1 2 3. Make it an essential part of your daily hygiene - like brushing your teeth, washing your hands, or taking a shower. Soothing, no burning or stinging, therapeutic saline rinse for nasal irrigation, moisturization and daily nasal hygiene; preservative, drug, iodine, BPA, gluten and latex free; pH neutral and isotonic; hypertonic with two or more packets; premixed packets of USP grade sodium chloride and sodium bicarbonate (natural ingredients with purity level 99% or higher); single piece, custom-designed black rounded cap fits any nasal opening. No push or pull components make for easy cleaning; Excellent cleansing prior to spraying nasal corticosteroids; smooth flow with easy-squeeze bottle; empties nearly 95% in upright position; suitable for use after sinus surgery and during pregnancy. Consult your physician with concerns; portable to travel; money back guarantee (if returned within 120 days from date of purchase). Contains: 1 rinse bottle 240 mL (8 oz); 1 custom designed cap; 1 tube; 5 premixed packets of USP grade (purity level 99%or higher) sodium chloride and sodium bicarbonate mixture; Educational brochure; Directions for use.
